label: 舞楽
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A repertoire of dances from the continent, accompanied by gagaku music and a large drum.  The dances are separated into two sub-repertoires: Tōgaku (“music from Tang [China]”), defined as the Left, and Komagaku (“music from Koma [Korea]”), defined as the Right.[雅楽、唐楽、高麗楽][RK]
